title: Ein Tag bei der Arbeit
translation: Every morning Anna gets up early and quickly gets dressed. She has a big appetite and eats an apple. After that, she goes to her workplace. Anna works in a large office. Today she has to complete an important task. Sometimes Anna takes a break and drinks tea. The elevator goes up and Anna gets in. She fills out forms and registers for a meeting. The registration was easy. Meanwhile, there is an announcement in the office. Attention everyone, please prepare for the next break. Anna writes notes and ticks the correct answers. She is soon ready to leave. After the workday, she comes home tired but happy. In the evening she thinks about the next trip.
